metadata.creator: Walt Disney Records
metadata.description:
Disney storytelling magic meets the musical powers of 1992 Academy Award-winning lyricist Tim Rice, Grammy Award-winning writer and performer Elton John, and renowned composer Hans Zimmer in the original motion picture soundtrack for Walt Disney Pictures' animated masterpiece, The Lion King. Weaving the rhythms and sounds of Africa into its captivating songs and evocative score, this soundtrack creates a sweeping musical landscape you'll never forget.

Tracks:
  1. Circle of Life (Performed by Carmen Twillie)
  2. I Just Can't Wait to Be King (Performed by Jason Weaver with Rowan Atkinson and Laura Williams)
  3. Be Prepared (Performed by Jeremy Irons with Whoopi Goldberg, Cheech Marin, and Jim Cummings)
  4. Hakuna Matata (Performed by Nathan Lane and Ernie Sabella with Jason Weaver and Joseph Williams)
  5. Can You Feel the Love Tonight (Performed by Joseph Williams and Sally Dworsky with Nathan Lane, Ernie Sabella, and Kristle Edwards)
  6. This Land (instrumental)
  7. ...To Die For (instrumental)
  8. Under the Stars (instrumental)
  9. King of Pride Rock (instrumental)
  10. Circle of Life (Performed by Elton John)
  11. I Just Can't Wait to Be King (Performed by Elton John)
  12. Can You Feel the Love Tonight" (end title) - Performed by Elton John
metadata.subject: The Lion King
Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
metadata.title: The Lion King (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
